column1: #Text=The cuffs move and jangle around and bump my wrists .
#Text=It would help me if you tighten them so they would n't shake around so much .
#Text=" Aang says : " Hey , what are you doing ?
#Text=I do n't understand , this is just a statue of Roku .
#Text=Is that what Roku wants to talk to me about ?
#Text=It 's a calendar , and the light will reach Roku on the solstice !
#Text=So , that 's when I 'll be able to speak to Roku ?
#Text=But I ca n't wait that long !
